MegaTrends.description: Large-scale, global forces shaping the future (e.g., climate change, digitalization).

MacroTrends.description: Industry-wide or sector-specific trends (e.g., remote work in tech, renewable energy in utilities).

MesoTrends.description: Trends at the organizational or community level (e.g., company culture shifts, local partnerships).

MicroTrends.description: Specific, emerging patterns or behaviors (e.g., adoption of a new tool, changes in customer preferences).
